p.k: 54% Las Vegas showman John Goodman is launched into high society when he is found to be the only living heir to the British throne. Royally funny comedy with Peter O'Toole
64% Workaholic dad Adam Sandler finds a magic remote. He can fast-forward to family time and take revenge on boss David Hasselhoff, but is his zapper really controlling him?

p.n: You Don't Mess With The Zohan
p.k: 55% Israeli commando Adam Sandler fakes his own death so he can become a New York hairdresser. Comedy with John Turturro
Adam Sandler finds his perfect match in Drew Barrymore. Everything is wonderful until the next day, when he discovers she's forgotten everything about him
64% Convict quarterback Adam Sandler finds himself coaching a team of felons to take on the prison guards. Comedy remake with the late Burt Reynolds
64% Workaholic dad Adam Sandler finds a magic remote. He can fast-forward to family time and take revenge on boss David Hasselhoff, but is his zapper really controlling him?
36% A top ad exec is driven round the bend when his infuriating twin sister comes to stay. Boisterous comedy fun with Adam Sandler in both roles
Smalltown chump Adam Sandler inherits a fortune (plus sneaky butler John Turturro). But his wealth draws gold-diggers and tricky reporter Winona Ryder
64% Adam Sandler stars as the irresponsible man-child who 'borrows' his roommate's son to prove to his girlfriend how mature he is, with surprising results. Cheeky comedy
69% Hot-headed ice hockey player Adam Sandler swaps his stick for a golf club, but still struggles to curb his uncouth ways. Sporting comedy
